name: Lotus Fan
description: Flash through the shadows and ambush an enemy, dealing 1393 Magic Damage.  After teleporting you unleash a fan of knives, dealing an additional 2155 Magic Damage over 10 seconds to the target and nearby enemies.  All enemies hit are afflicted with Minor Vulnerability for 10 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 5%.
effectLines: Targets in an area around the enemy take damage and are afflicted with Minor Vulnerability.

After teleporting you unleash a fan of knives, dealing an additional $2 Magic Damage over 10 seconds to the target and nearby enemies.  All enemies hit are afflicted with Minor Vulnerability for 10 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 5%.
